p: The WHO ILI case definition had the best performance (aDOR 2.69; 95% CI 2.42–2.99) and was superior in people aged ≥65 years (aDOR 5.87; 95% CI 3.92–8.80) and in those with comorbidities (aDOR 4.00, 2.80–5.72). In contrast, the ILI definition of ECDC had a global performance of 1.52 (95% CI 1.40–1.66), and performed better in people aged ≥65 years (aDOR 2.32; 95% CI 1.62–3.34).
